ROUNDCUBE_HTTP_PORT_DESC: The HTTP port for the web server. Defaults to 8040.
ROUNDCUBE_DEFAULT_HOST_DESC: The default hostname for the IMAP server. Defaults to imap.gmail.com.
ROUNDCUBE_DEFAULT_PORT_DESC: The default connection port for the IMAP server. Defaults to 143.
ROUNDCUBE_DEFAULT_SMTP_SERVER_DESC: The default hostname for the SMTP server. Defaults to smtp.gmail.com.
ROUNDCUBE_DEFAULT_SMTP_PORT_DESC: The default connection port for the SMTP server. Defaults to 587.
